snippet: A United Nations investigator castigated the Iranian government for what he called “a striking pattern of violations of fundamental human rights guaranteed under international law.”
abstract: Report by United Nations investigator Ahmed Shaheed castigates the Iranian government for human rights abuses, including violations of due process in the courts, illegal detentions, extensive accusations of torture of prisoners, and maltreatment of dissidents, minorities, journalists and women.
